thread.title: Step-Over Foldable Bikes - KBO Debuted the 'K1' and 'K2' E-Bikes to Accommodate Consumers' Needs (TrendHunter.com)
thread.title_full: Step-Over Foldable Bikes - KBO Debuted the 'K1' and 'K2' E-Bikes to Accommodate Consumers' Needs (TrendHunter.com)

author: Colin Smith
title: Step-Over Foldable Bikes - KBO Debuted the 'K1' and 'K2' E-Bikes to Accommodate Consumers' Needs (TrendHunter.com)
text:
The KBO K1 is a stylish and affordable folding e-bike designed for urban commuters and explorers. Its compact and versatile design makes it suitable for various riding scenarios. Notable design features include a 6061 aluminum bike frame, 20" x 3" tires, and a fold-and-unfold mechanism that allows for easy storage and transport within just two steps. Additionally, the K1 incorporates an innovative integrated battery design, where the battery is hidden and protected inside the frame, minimizing potential electrical faults.
The KBO K1 e-bike boasts a 500W motor capable of speeds up to 20 mph. Its built-in lithium-ion battery has a capacity of 499 Wh, providing a range of up to 45 miles per charge. Without the battery, the K1 weighs 48 lbs. The 20" x 3" tires ensure stability and traction on various surfaces. KBO offers direct-to-consumer pricing, making the K1 cost-effective and accessible. As of now, the K1 is available for purchase directly from KBO. Interested buyers can find more details on the KBO website, linked above.
Image Credit: KBO
KBO Debuted the 'K1' and 'K2' E-Bikes to Accommodate Consumers' Needs
[Colin Smith](/Colin96)— April 11, 2024 — [Autos](/autos)
